_comment: Sample MCP server config for Java development with Claude Code.
Copy the relevant mcpServers entries into your project or user config.
Option A: Add to a project's .claude/settings.local.json under 'mcpServers'
Option B: Add globally via: claude mcp add <name> ...
Pick ONE of the two sections below per server (docker-compose OR direct).
IntelliJ MCP is configured from the IDE, not here.

mcpServers._section_2: --- Direct (no Docker, Claude Code spawns the process) ---
